directions: Season roast all over with salt and black pepper and place roast in a slow cooker. Whisk golden mushroom soup, sliced mushrooms, cream of mushroom soup, onion soup mix, and garlic together in a bowl; pour over beef roast.
Cook on Low for 8 to 10 hours.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed golden mushroom soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
title: Slow Cooker Creamy Pot Roast
